resources.string: Please click button to Start location update and to Stop, if already running.
Required permission to fetch vehicle\'s current location at regular interval.
Required permission to write location data to file.
Install or Update Google Play Services to continue using application.
Location setting should be On to use this application.
Could not determine location setting, pl On it to use the application.
Location service running, do you really want to stop location update and close application?
Request for External Storage and Location permission.
Location permission required to get vehicle position and write to file on External Storage.
Application requires both External Storage and Location permission. Please allow both permissions to keep using application.
